Color Meaning Additional Notes
Cannot change directly in Spektrix system Your web developer may be able to mask this text using CSS styling
Displayed according to arguments in iframe url This just means adding some text on to the url such as "SortBy=Date" in order to have Events sorted by date. Will likely require a small bit of work by a developer. Full documentation can be found on the integrate portal.
Item-level infromation, editable in Admin interface
Editable in Settings or Website Admin interface
Optional information that displays conditionally
